channel.title: @harmstyler - A Web Development Blog
channel.description: Recent content on @harmstyler - A Web Development Blog

item.title: About
item.description: Hi, I’m Tyler Harms. I am a professional software developer, father, and husband from the great state of South Dakota. I make things for the web and write high performance software. While I was an eZ Publish expert in the past, with extensive php experience; since 2019 my focus has been on Python and Docker. I have extensive experience with serverside development, including PHP, Ruby, and Python. I have experience with containerization, orchestration, and deployment of applications with docker and kubernetes.
